department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: Supply, delivery and offloading of fresh fruit and vegetables
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Atlantic Region, on behalf of various government departments has a requirement for a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery and offloading of various quantities of fresh fruit and vegetables on an as and when requested basis for the period of the Standing Offer from 1 June 2023 to 31 May 2024, broken down into 4 separate events.
full_summary:
---

**Government Tender Notice: Regional Master Standing Offer for Fresh Fruit and Vegetables**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply of fresh fruits and vegetables.

**Reference Number:** WS3919153351
**Solicitation Number:** WS3919153351
**Tender Closing Date:** May 25, 2023, 2:00 PM (14:00:00)

**Notice Details:**

The government has a requirement for a RMSO that will cover the supply of various quantities of fresh fruits and vegetables from June 1, 2023, to May 31, 2024. The Standing Offer will be divided into 4 separate events.

**Supply Requirements:**

* Fresh Fruits (UNSPSC: 50300000)
* Fresh Vegetables (UNSPSC: 50400000)

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada
* New Brunswick
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

Andrew MacFarlane
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15775051?extsite=MTU3NzUwNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Submission Guidelines:**

Bidders may bid on any period of their choice. The Standing Offer will be awarded based on the lowest price. Responses to this solicitation must be received by the tender closing date.

---

Technical information has been kept unchanged. Never modify any data from the original that the contractor sent you.
